mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.title AS "title", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remote_addr AS "remoteAddr", a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.request_uri AS "requestUri", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.exception AS "exception"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_log a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log( id, type, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, exception ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{exception} )
